attributes.action: Allow teenagers 13 - 15 to take on more jobs with longer hours working on Saturday and Sunday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 15 and desperatley want a job. Not only will this job give me money but a stronger work ethic in the future and I think allowing 13 - 15 year olds to work more hours at weekends will allow us to work in wide variety of places such as shops, cinemas, cafes etc.
